Segment.name: B3
Segment.comment: To transmit basic data relating to the carrier's invoice

Field.name: ShipmentQualifier
Field.comment: Code defining relationship of this shipment with respect to other shipments given to the carrier at the same time

Field.name: ShipmentIdentificationNumber
Field.comment: Identification number assigned to the shipment by the shipper that uniquely identifies the shipment from origin to ultimate destination and is not subject to modification; (Does not contain blanks or special characters)

Field.name: ShipmentMethodOfPayment
Field.comment: Code identifying payment terms for transportation charges

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: NetAmountDue
Field.comment: Total charges to be paid by the receiver of this transaction set expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified

Field.name: CorrectionIndicator
Field.comment: Code used to indicate that the transaction set contains information which corrects previous information

Field.name: DeliveryDate
Field.comment: Date for delivery of cargo to final consignee or to next mode expressed in format CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: DateTimeQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: TariffServiceCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the types of services for rating purposes

Field.name: TransportationTermsCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the trade terms which apply to the shipment transportation responsibility

SyntaxNote.name: P0910
SyntaxNote.comment: If either B309 or B310 is present, then the other is required.
